p: 5-FU injection (25 mg/mL, No. 1708061) was provided by Tianjin JinYao Pharmaceutical Co., Ltd. (Tianjin, China). Standard compounds (purity > 98%) of ginsenosides Rg1, Rc, Rd, Re, Rb1, Rb2 and Rf were purchased from Chengdu Must Bio-Technology Co. Ltd. (Chengdu, China). Other chemicals and reagents were obtained from commercial sources.
